content:
# Source Language
English

# Target Language
Russian

# Target Fragment
quiet hallway

# Context
Most offices were empty. <fragment>quiet hallway</fragment> A clock ticked loudly near the stairs.

# Source Language
English

# Target Language
Russian

# Target Fragment
weathered bench

# Context
It sat under a tall oak tree. <fragment>weathered bench</fragment> Carved initials covered the surface.

# Source Language
English

# Target Language
Russian

# Target Fragment
crisp envelope

# Context
The letter bore an unfamiliar seal. <fragment>crisp envelope</fragment> She turned it over before opening.
